titleStmt.title: [The principal points which are at this daye in controuersie, concerning the holly supper and of the masse.]
titleStmt.author: Viret, Pierre, 1511-1571.
Shoute, J.

notesStmt.note: By Pierre Viret; translated out of French by J. Shoute --STC.
Running title reads: Of the Lordes Supper, and the masse.
Copy at reel 2087 lacks title page and leaves D8 and E1.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
